About.title: Where Craft Meets Character
About.p1: Born in the heart of Bali, Mebayu blends traditional craftsmanship with contemporary design. Each piece is carefully shaped by skilled local artisans using full-grain genuine leather.
About.p2: We create more than accessories — we craft companions. Pieces that soften, age beautifully, and carry the marks of your journey.

Products.description: Clean silhouettes. Honest materials. Designed with intention and built to endure.
